name: Starmie
description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.effect: Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.  This ability has no effect in battle.

abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.effect: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment when it is switched out for another Pokémon.  If this ability is acquired during battle, the Pokémon is cured upon leaving battle before losing the temporary ability.

abilities.name: Analytic
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn.  future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
abilities.description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
